Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource

Interface ReadableResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ByteSized, Readable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileService, NetworkResource, Resource, WritableResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseHttpResource, BaseNetworkResource, BaseReadableResource, BaseWritableResource, File, FtpResource, HttpGetResource, HttpPostResource, HttpPutResource, InputResource, NullResource, OutputResource, PackageResource, ResourceSection, SecureFtpResource, SecureHttpGetResource, SecureHttpPostResource, StringResource, ZipEntry
    public interface ReadableResource
extends Readable
    Interface to an object that is Readable and can be read with a ResourceReader. A reader can be obtained with:
    • reader()
    • reader(ProgressReporter)
    • reader(ProgressReporter, Charset)

    The resource() method must be defined by the implementer, as well as the method copyTo(WritableResource, CopyMode, ProgressReporter).

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default StringResource asStringResource()  
      default java.nio.charset.Charset charset()  
      void copyTo​(WritableResource destination, CopyMode mode, ProgressReporter reporter)
      Copies this resource to the given destination
      default ResourceReader reader()  
      default ResourceReader reader​(ProgressReporter reporter)  
      default ResourceReader reader​(ProgressReporter reporter, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)  
      Resource resource()  

      • Methods inherited from interface com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.io.ByteSized

        isLargerThan, isSmallerThan

      • Methods inherited from interface com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.io.Readable

        bytes, isReadable, onOpenForReading, openForReading, openForReading
